comment:
* Information about the properties of a location provider.
 *
 * @deprecated This class is incapable of representing unknown provider properties and may return
 * incorrect results on the rare occasion when a provider's properties are unknown. Prefer using
 * {@link LocationManager#getProviderProperties(String)} to retrieve {@link ProviderProperties}
 * instead.

variables.name: OUT_OF_SERVICE
variables.comment: * @deprecated Location provider statuses are no longer supported.

variables.name: TEMPORARILY_UNAVAILABLE
variables.comment: * @deprecated Location provider statuses are no longer supported.

variables.name: AVAILABLE
variables.comment: * @deprecated Location provider statuses are no longer supported.

methods.name: public String getName()
methods.comment: * Returns the name of this provider.

methods.name: public boolean meetsCriteria(Criteria criteria)
methods.comment:
* Returns true if this provider meets the given criteria,
     * false otherwise.

methods.name: public static boolean propertiesMeetCriteria(String name, ProviderProperties properties, Criteria criteria)
public boolean requiresNetwork()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the provider requires access to a
     * data network (e.g., the Internet), false otherwise.

methods.name: public boolean requiresSatellite()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the provider requires access to a
     * satellite-based positioning system (e.g., GPS), false
     * otherwise.

methods.name: public boolean requiresCell()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the provider requires access to an appropriate
     * cellular network (e.g., to make use of cell tower IDs), false
     * otherwise.

methods.name: public boolean hasMonetaryCost()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the use of this provider may result in a
     * monetary charge to the user, false if use is free.  It is up to
     * each provider to give accurate information.

methods.name: public boolean supportsAltitude()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the provider is able to provide altitude
     * information, false otherwise.  A provider that reports altitude
     * under most circumstances but may occassionally not report it
     * should return true.

methods.name: public boolean supportsSpeed()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the provider is able to provide speed
     * information, false otherwise.  A provider that reports speed
     * under most circumstances but may occassionally not report it
     * should return true.

methods.name: public boolean supportsBearing()
methods.comment:
* Returns true if the provider is able to provide bearing
     * information, false otherwise.  A provider that reports bearing
     * under most circumstances but may occassionally not report it
     * should return true.

methods.name: public int getPowerRequirement()
methods.comment:
* Returns the power requirement for this provider, one of the ProviderProperties.POWER_USAGE_*
     * constants.

methods.name: public int getAccuracy()
methods.comment:
* Returns the rough accuracy of this provider, one of the ProviderProperties.ACCURACY_*
     * constants.

methodNames: public static boolean propertiesMeetCriteria(String name, ProviderProperties properties, Criteria criteria)
